text: "I'm Not in Love" is a 1975 song by British band 10cc and is the second single from their third studio album The Original Soundtrack. It topped the single charts in the United Kingdom, Ireland and Canada and also made the top 20 on the other countries it charted on. It went on the be covered other artists since its release. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:10cc songs Category:Deni Hines songs Category:The Pretenders songs Category:Fun Lovin' Criminals songs Category:Johnny Logan (singer) songs Category:Progressive pop songs Category:Art pop songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: I'm Not in Love
